meanings: (be) sufficient, enough, ample, good, thorough, satisfactory

vlive.korean: [다시 보니 물이 충분한 거 같기도] 물 충분할 거 같지 않아? [But it looks okay] Don't you think it has enough water? 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] “셉라면➀” (세븐틴 : SEVENTEEN)
vlive.english: [But it looks okay] Don't you think it has enough water?

vlive.korean: 이 정도면 충분할 거 같은데? I think this is enough? 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU'EST W] L.O.Λ.E RECORD B-Side EP.02
한 2시간 해도 충분할 거 같아요. I think about two hours would be enough. 듣기 View video THE BOYZ : 오늘의 주재
vlive.english: I think about two hours would be enough.

vlive.korean: 이거면 충분할 것 같은데요 - 이거 한 번 해보면 안 돼요? I think this is enough. - Can I try? 듣기 View video PeekaVoo! : [THE100] 덥즈의 꽁냥꽁냥 요리시간 (aka.대참사?!) - EP 13
vlive.english: I think this is enough. - Can I try?

vlive.korean: 노래만으로 충분할 것 같네요. you are in love. 듣기 View video V MUSIC : [FULL] 2017 ASF LIVE FESTA 'Fall In Music'

examples.korean: $100 should cover your expenses. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 100달러면 당신 경비로 충분할 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
